title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.1 - Competitive class
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.1 - Competitive class

State Regulations

Civilian positions in the service of the New York State

Police shall be filled pursuant to section 6 of article
5
of the Constitution
of the State of New York, so far as practicable, after competitive
examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
477.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
